The competition series will allow contestants as young as 12 to audition, a decision Simon Cowell defended on the call after being asked if kids that young should be subjects to public scrutiny. We've started to see a trend with kids this age and what they can do. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer... times have changed.
